author: CBC News
title: From energy to food prices and even inflation, here's how war in Ukraine could impact Canada's economy | CBC News
description: It may be a world away and pale in comparison to the human toll, but Russia's decision to invade Ukrainian territory this week will have many direct and indirect impacts on Canada's economy.
content:
